front.title: Problem statements and uses cases for lightweight Child Security Associations

abstract.t: IKE SAs may have one or more child SAs that are used for traffic protection. This document collects arguments for (and against) having more fine-grained sub-child-SAs. They can be used to separate data streams for various technical reasons but share the same security properties and traffic selectors. This shall allow for a more flexible use of IPsec in multiple scenarios.
